Plot: In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.
Title: Return to Never Land
Writer: Temple Mathews (screenplay), Carter Crocker (additional written material), J.M. Barrie (play)
Actors: Harriet Owen, Blayne Weaver, Corey Burton, Jeff Bennett
